pitrou commented on issue #5039: ARROW-6170: [R] Faster docker-compose build
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5039#issuecomment-519550378
 
 
   First:
   `docker-compose build cpp`
   Then:
   `docker-compose build r`
   
   And ideally the following then works (but [it doesn't](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6171), at least for me):
   `docker-compose run r`

fsaintjacques commented on pull request #5039: ARROW-6170: [R] Faster docker-compose build
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5039#discussion_r312564637
 
 

 ##########
 File path: r/Dockerfile
 ##########
 @@ -60,9 +60,14 @@ ENV ARROW_R_DEV=TRUE
 ENV PKG_CONFIG_PATH=${PKG_CONFIG_PATH}:/build/cpp/src/arrow:/opt/conda/lib/pkgconfig
 ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/conda/lib/:/build/cpp/src/arrow:/arrow/r/src
 
-RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('devtools', repos = 'http://cran.rstudio.com')" && \
-    Rscript -e "devtools::install_github('romainfrancois/decor')" && \
-    Rscript -e "install.packages(c( \
+# Ensure parallel R package installation
+RUN printf "options(Ncpus = parallel::detectCores())\n" >> /etc/R/Rprofile.site
+# Also ensure parallel compilation of each individual package
+RUN printf "MAKEFLAGS=-j8\n" >> /usr/lib/R/etc/Makeconf
 
 Review comment:
   ```suggestion
   RUN printf "MAKEFLAGS=-j$(nproc)\n" >> /usr/lib/R/etc/Makeconf
   ```
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

pitrou commented on pull request #5039: ARROW-6170: [R] Faster docker-compose build
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5039#discussion_r312890556
 
 

 ##########
 File path: r/Dockerfile
 ##########
 @@ -60,9 +60,14 @@ ENV ARROW_R_DEV=TRUE
 ENV PKG_CONFIG_PATH=${PKG_CONFIG_PATH}:/build/cpp/src/arrow:/opt/conda/lib/pkgconfig
 ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/conda/lib/:/build/cpp/src/arrow:/arrow/r/src
 
-RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('devtools', repos = 'http://cran.rstudio.com')" && \
-    Rscript -e "devtools::install_github('romainfrancois/decor')" && \
-    Rscript -e "install.packages(c( \
+# Ensure parallel R package installation
+RUN printf "options(Ncpus = parallel::detectCores())\n" >> /etc/R/Rprofile.site
+# Also ensure parallel compilation of each individual package
+RUN printf "MAKEFLAGS=-j8\n" >> /usr/lib/R/etc/Makeconf
 
 Review comment:
   No, because that would lead to quadratic expansion. Right now we use up to `8*ncores` (max number of compilation jobs per install * max number of parallel installs). This MAKEFLAGS is because R sometimes installs packages serially, and they can take some time to compile.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org
